subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte has enough talent and whimsy to pierce Michael Phelps’s Beijing dream of equaling or eclipsing Mark Spitz’s seven-gold medal haul from the 1972 Olympics.
snippet: Ryan Lochte has enough talent and whimsy to pierce Michael Phelps’s Beijing dream of equaling or eclipsing Mark Spitz’s seven-gold medal haul from the 1972 Olympics.
